content.rendered:
We offer an affordable package for entrepreneurs looking to start their business as a proprietorship. Our package includes the essential steps of getting your business registered under the GST and MSME.

Here’s a breakdown of the procedure involved:

  • GST REGISTRATION
  • MEME REGISTRATION
  • ASSISTANCE IN OPENING CURRENT ACCOUNT

 

Get ready to embark on your entrepreneurial adventure. All the best, hustler! And give OKstartups an opportunity be a part of your entrepreneurial journey to success.

excerpt.rendered: A proprietorship business, also known as a sole proprietorship, is one of the simplest and most common forms of business ownership. It is a type of business structure where a single individual owns and operates the business. In this arrangement, the owner is personally responsible for all aspects of the business, including its debts and liabilities.
